## IIndexedDataConnector interface

Generic descriptor of indexable data, good for parallel or interleaved buffers. Makes the assumption that each index has one or more associated values, accessed via `offsets`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IIndexedDataConnector<TOffsets> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [offsets](./core.iindexeddataconnector.offsets.md) | TOffsets |  |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getBlockByteSize()](./core.iindexeddataconnector.getblockbytesize.md) |  |
|  [getBlockElementCount()](./core.iindexeddataconnector.getblockelementcount.md) | The number of elements in a block. May not be adjusted after creation. |
|  [getEnd()](./core.iindexeddataconnector.getend.md) | Start index + length. Useful for iteration. |
|  [getLength()](./core.iindexeddataconnector.getlength.md) | The current length. |
|  [getLoggableValue()](./core.iindexeddataconnector.getloggablevalue.md) |  |
|  [getMaximumLength()](./core.iindexeddataconnector.getmaximumlength.md) | The maximum number of blocks that can be used. May not be adjusted after creation. |
|  [getStart()](./core.iindexeddataconnector.getstart.md) |  |
